snippet: Omar Suleiman’s sudden re-emergence has spurred fear — and, in some precincts, hope — at the prospect of a new strongman in Egypt.
abstract: Omar Suleiman’s sudden re-emergence from the shadows of Egypt's fallen government spurs fear, and hope, at the prospect of a new strongman coming to power; his presidential campaign's deep and continuing ties to the Egyptian intelligence services raises questions and credibility of the vote, which is set to begin May 23.
lead_paragraph: Omar Suleiman’s sudden re-emergence has spurred fear — and, in some precincts, hope — at the prospect of a new strongman in Egypt.

headline.seo: Egypt’s Ex-Spy Chief Emerges as Presidential Candidate
headline.main: Election Is a New Start for an Aide to Mubarak
headline.print_headline: Election Is A New Start For an Aide To Mubarak
